original_text: While they were bringing out the money that had been taken into the temple of the Lord, Hilkiah the priest found the Book of the Law of the Lord that had been given through Moses.
korean_text: 무리가 여호와의 전에 헌금한 돈을 꺼낼 때에 제사장 힐기야가 모세가 전한 여호와의 율법책을 발견하고

sentences.original_text: While they were bringing out the money
that had been taken into the temple of the Lord
the Book of the Law of the Lord
that had been given through Moses
